statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, purchase_amount FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT purchase_date, behavior_pattern FROM transactions ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE behavior_pattern = 'High Risk' AND promotion_targeted = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM transactions ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, purchase_amount FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 100 AND promotion_targeted = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT behavior_pattern FROM transactions WHERE behavior_pattern LIKE '%repeat%' AND purchase_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions;
SELECT user_id, total_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_time FROM user_behaviors WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY behavior_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;

SELECT u.user_id, t.transaction_time, b.behavior_type FROM user_transactions t JOIN user_behaviors b ON t.user_id = b.user_id JOIN user_accounts u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.behavior_type = 'login' AND t.total_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT promo_name, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE discount_rate >= 0.2 ORDER BY discount_rate ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT promo_name, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-08-31' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM purchase_history GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) FROM purchase_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 3;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 200);
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE discount_amount BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY start_date ASC;

SELECT user_id, transaction_id, promotion_name FROM purchase_history JOIN promotions ON purchase_history.promotion_id = promotions.promotion_id WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT promotion_name, discount, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE end_date > NOW();
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 200 AND amount < 100.00 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM promotions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
